name: Xero
description: Add a Xero Instance to connect your existing Xero account to the Finance Hub, allowing you to manage customers, vendors, employees, invoices, expenses, sales etc. across multiple Finance Elements. You will need your Xero account information to add an instance.
configDescription: If you do not have an Xero account, you can create one at QuickBooks Signup

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Authentication Type
configuration.description: For Public & Partner applications select oauth1. For Private applications select custom. If using a Partner or Private application be sure to include your Base64 Encoded PFX File & Private Key Password

configuration.name: Base64 Encoded PFX File
configuration.description: Your PFX File converted to a Base64 encoded string. Please refer to the Cloud Elements Xero Element Documentation for more information.

configuration.name: Is this a Partner Application Approved By Xero
Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)
